Day #1 of Google's FORM design conference

Day #1 of Google's FORM design conference — Matias Duarte, Google’s Vice President of design: “We’re no longer controlling every pixel. It’s going to be more like jazz improvisation.” I like where they’re heading with this.

Published November 3 2014

Enjoy your day.
